events.1861: 9,300 mm rainfall in July in Cherrapunji, Assam becomes a world record.
events.1865: Jagannath Sunkersett, great social worker, educationist and sculptor of modern Mumbai, passed away at the age of 62.
events.1880: Nawab Rai\Dhanpat Rai, 'Prem Chand', great litterateur, writer, editor, journalist and headmaster, was born at Lamahi village near Varanasi, UP.
events.1902: Keshav Shankar Pillai, great writer and Padma Bhushan awardee, was born at Kayamkulam in Kerala.
events.1907: Damodar Dharmanand Kosambi, famous ancient researcher and mathematician, was born.
events.1912: Allan Octavian, great social reformer, patriot, lawyer, journalist and politician, passed away at the age of 84.
events.1914: Amar Nath Chawla, politician, was born at Taunggri, (Burma).
events.1916: Mohanlal Sukhadia, chief minister of Rajasthan and freedom fighter, was born at Jhalawar.
events.1919: Hemchandra "Hemu" Ramchandra Adhikari, cricketer (right-handed batsman 1947-59), was born in Baroda.
events.1933: Gandhiji was arrested from Sabarmati Ashram and imprisoned without trial.
events.1938: Khalid Anwer Ansari, social worker, was born.
events.1940: Udham Singh, fiery revolutionary, freedom fighter and social reformer, was hanged by the British Government in the Pantone Villa Jail, London.
events.1948: State Transport Corporation was established in Calcutta.
events.1952: Bela Mitra, commander of "Nari Vahini" and activist of "Azad Hind Fauj", passed away. She also worked as partition refugee.
events.1964: Air Marshal Aspy Merwan Engineer DFC retired from the Air Officer Commanding, India Command.
events.1974: B. S. Chawla was appointed as the Narcotics Commissioner of India. He headed this office till 15-08-1974.
events.1980: Muhammad Rafi, famous playback singer, died at the age of 40.
events.1985: Lalit Maken, Congress (I) M.P, his wife and a visitor at their residence in Delhi were shot down by terrorists.
events.1988: Air Chief Marshal D A La Fontaine PVSM, AVSM, VM. retired as the Air Officer Commanding, India Command.
events.1990: Charan Singh Rathi at New Delhi sets record for 20 km W. in 1.25.48\_\_.
events.1991: Air Chief Marshal Nirmal Chandra Suri PVSM, AVSM, VM, ADC. became the Air Officer Commanding, India Command. He was in this office till 31/July/1993.
events.1992: Thailand Airlines crashed in Himalayan Range, 113 persons died.
events.1993: Zafar Saifullah was appointed as the Cabinet Secretary of India. He held this office till 31-07-1994.
events.1995: Rishang Keshing,Manipur CM, wins the vote of confidence.
events.1996: Supreme Court exempts Rao from appearing in CMM court personally.
events.1997: V. Thangapandian (64), Tamil Nadu Commercial Taxes Minister, died at Rajapalayam in Virudhunagar district.
events.2000: The Lok Sabha passes by voice vote a bill for creation of Chhattisgarh state.
